name: next-practice
author: Nicolás Omar González Passerino
description: Repository created to record my practice learning NextJs

scripts.setup-all: npm i && npm run setup-react-basics && npm run setup-next-essentials && npm run setup-routing-and-rendering && npm run setup-work-with-apis && npm run setup-caching
scripts.setup-react-basics: cd ./1-react-basics/frontend && npm i && cd ../backend && npm i
scripts.setup-next-essentials: cd ./2-next-essentials/concepts && npm i && cd ../project && npm i
scripts.setup-work-with-apis: cd ./4-work-with-apis/mutations && npm i && cd ../queries && npm i
scripts.setup-caching: cd ./5-caching && npm i && cd backend && npm i
